name: Discovery Ancient Hanoi In A Beautiful and Meaningful Trip With The Vietnamese Local Youth
description: Our desire is not yet as macro as ‘creating a better world’ or ‘enhancing equality in Vietnam’ because we are just small drops of sand in this enormous world. For now, we just want to ignite lights for the children in the North of Vietnam by helping them widen their eyes and to gain access to a proper education as well as career opportunities, maximizing improvements and social impact in human and environmental well-being as well operating corporate responsibility programs. We believe in the ideology of Buddhism ‘when giving, you are receiving’ so our vision is ‘by giving, you receive more than you expected’
